Achievement.Title: Secret Mission 5
Achievement.Description: Downed the Dreaded Giant when it reared back and left itself wide open.

Achievement.Title: Secret Mission 3
Achievement.Description: Learning from Karol's experience, you used the billybally plants to stun Gattuso.

Achievement.Title: Secret Mission 2
Achievement.Description: Downed Goliath by attacking its Achilles' heel while it charged X Buster.

Achievement.Title: Eureka!
Achievement.Description: You used Synthesis to create new equipment and items. Keep it up!

Achievement.Title: Secret Mission 1
Achievement.Description: Defeated Zagi while protecting Estellise from Zagi's attacks.
